About Me

Let Me Tell You A Few Things...

BIO

Hi! I'm Muskan, 21 years young who loves to read books, write quotes, and do photography. I specialize in web and app design. I am keen to learn something new every day.
I did my Industrial Trainings in domains in which I have an interest, and I gained an ample amount of knowledge.
As a fresher, I am eager to expand my knowledge by working in companies of all shapes and sizes.
